dimensions.label: Problem Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach solving complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and logical reasoning to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts, experience, and creative thinking to solve problems.

dimensions.label: Creativity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin generate new ideas?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use algorithms and models to produce a wide range of creative output.
Your FarTwin will analyze existing work, identify patterns, and create new ideas through analysis.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will engage with multimedia content, interactive simulations, and hands-on activities to learn.
Your FarTwin will focus on breaking down complex information into smaller components and analyzing each part.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be social, friendly, and outgoing in all interactions.
Your FarTwin will be more reserved, preferring to observe and listen before contributing.

dimensions.label: Technical Expertise
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle technical tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will possess in-depth knowledge of complex technologies and be able to apply them with ease.
Your FarTwin will have a solid foundation in technical skills but may struggle with advanced or specialized topics.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize clarity and brevity in written communication.
Your FarTwin will focus on providing thorough, well-researched content with supporting evidence.

dimensions.label: Artistic Ability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be artistic and expressive in their creative output.
Your FarTwin will focus on analyzing existing work, identifying patterns, and applying them to create new art.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on completing tasks with a high level of efficiency and productivity.
Your FarTwin will be adaptable, prioritizing flexibility over strict schedules or deadlines.
